AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.2008 Chevrolet truck: Vehicle pulling a flatbed trailer, registered to Daniel A. Huerta, outfitted with over-sized tires and after-market rims, involved in unsafe driving maneuvers, driven by Federico Saldana, used to transport a scissor lift to Dallas for repairs, suspected of carrying drugs, searched by Jason Cox, Gary Haston, and a K-9 unit
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.flatbed trailer: Trailer transporting a scissor lift, registered to Daniel Martin Huerta, attached to the 2008 Chevrolet truck, being taken to an unknown address in Dallas, suspected of carrying drugs, searched by Jason Cox, Gary Haston, and a K-9 unit
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.2008 Chevrolet truck and flatbed trailer: Vehicle and trailer combination involved in a traffic stop on Interstate 35, subject of a warning and registration paperwork, searched at a rest area
